page.prototype: .CopyItemTo as L (TargetContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer, ItemName as C)

argument.name: TargetContainer
argument.description: The destination container where items are copied to.

page.description: Copies an item to another SubContainer.
page.example:
dim SubContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer = null_value() dim TargetSubContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::SubContainer::Open(SubContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';", "logs") CallResult = A5Storage::SubContainer::Open(TargetSubContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot2';", "logs") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? SubContainer.CopyItemTo(TargetSubContainer, "MyTargetPath/MyObject") = .T.
